it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class ControllerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.ControllerState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangeDiceValueControllerState, ChangeDiceValueUnitaryControllerState, ChooseFromTrackControllerState, DraftControllerState, EndControllerState, EndToolCardEffectControllerState, EnforceTrackChosenColorSimilarityControllerState, MoveControllerState, PlaceControllerState, RerollDraftedControllerState, RerollDraftPoolControllerState, RollOverDraftedControllerState, SkipNextTurnControllerState, StartControllerState, SwapDraftedWithTrackControllerState, SwitchDraftedWithBagControllerState, ToolCardControllerState

    public abstract class ControllerState
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that represents a generic state of the Controller.
    Author:
    Lorenzo Minto, Federico Haag (refactor)

      • draftDiceFromDraftPool

        public Message draftDiceFromDraftPool(Dice dice)
        Drafts a specified dice from the current draft pool and sets it as the drafted dice on the current turn.
        Parameters:
        dice - the dice to be drafted.
        Returns:
        a message containing the result of the mov

      • placeDice

        public Message placeDice(int row,
                         int col)
        Places the drafted dice of the current turn on the specified cell (row and column).
        Parameters:
        row - the row index of the cell where the dice is to be placed.
        col - the column index of the cell where the dice is to be placed.
        Returns:
        a message containing the result of the mov

      • useToolCard

        public Message useToolCard(ToolCard toolCard)
        Activates, if allowed, the effect of the passed tool card by initiating the relative state succession. The passed toolCard is set as activeToolCard in the Controller.
        Parameters:
        toolCard - the toolCard to be activated.
        Returns:
        a message containing the result of the mov

      • chooseDiceFromTrack

        public Message chooseDiceFromTrack(Dice dice,
                                   int slotNumber)
        Removes the specified dice from the specified track slot and sets it as trackChosenDice on the current turn.
        Parameters:
        dice - the chosen dice.
        slotNumber - the number of the TrackSlot where the dice is.
        Returns:
        a message containing the result of the mov

      • moveDice

        public Message moveDice(int rowFrom,
                        int colFrom,
                        int rowTo,
                        int colTo)
        Moves, if legal, the dice found at the cell designated by (rowFrom, colFrom) to the cell designated by (rowTo, colTo).
        Parameters:
        rowFrom - the row index of the cell FROM which the dice is to be moved.
        colFrom - the column index of the cell FROM which the dice is to be moved.
        rowTo - the row index of the cell TO which the dice is to be moved.
        colTo - the column index of the cell TO which the dice is to be moved.
        Returns:
        a message containing the result of the mov

      • executeImplicitBehaviour

        public void executeImplicitBehaviour()
        Executes some implicit behaviour relative to the state. It does nothing when state is not Implicit.
